summary: Sprint 10 UI Wiring + Foundation Fixes - All features verified and working. Fixed 1 bug: thumbnail preview case-sensitivity. Backend 16/16 tests passed. Frontend 13/13 features verified.

minor.issue: Multiple 'width(-1) and height(-1)' warnings in Analytics page during initial render. Known Recharts library timing issue - charts display correctly after render.

passed_tests: 1. FVS System shows interactive AI recommendation cards with Chanakya-specific ideas ✓
2. FVS System shows Top Competitor Shorts with thumbnails from Vayak Nazariya etc ✓
3. Scan for New Ideas button visible and functional ✓
4. Analytics page has Performance and Trend Intelligence tabs ✓
5. Trend Intelligence tab shows Competitor Videos section ✓
6. Trend Intelligence tab shows Trending Keywords section ✓
7. Overview Dashboard shows real YouTube data: 1,320 subscribers, 116,803 views, 73 videos ✓
8. Overview shows Best Performing Short with thumbnail and view count ✓
9. ROI Center shows CPM-based calculation ($1.50 default, $175.20 ad revenue) ✓
10. ROI Settings panel allows editing CPM rate and sponsorship per video ✓
11. Blog page displays 5 Chanakya Sutra-themed articles ✓
12. Help page loads without error toast (proper empty data handling) ✓
13. Strategy Lab tone field pre-populated with 'strategic, sharp, guru-like, authoritative' ✓
14. Assets page shows image previews for thumbnail assets (FIXED case-sensitivity bug) ✓
16. Sidebar shows submission count badge (73) next to Submissions ✓
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/AssetsPage.jsx - Fixed thumbnail preview case-sensitivity bug (asset.type === 'Thumbnail' to asset.type?.toLowerCase() === 'thumbnail')
seed_data_creation: Real YouTube data from Chanakya Sutra channel via OAuth. 73 videos, 1,320 subscribers, 116,803 total views.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Sprint 10 complete. All UI wiring features working: FVS recommendations, Analytics Trend Intelligence, ROI CPM model, Blog articles, Help page, Strategy tone pre-population, Assets thumbnails, sidebar navigation changes. One minor fix applied for thumbnail case-sensitivity.

sprint_10_live_verification_checks.fvs_chanakya_recommendations: PASSED - Shows 3 Chanakya-specific AI content ideas with performance tiers
sprint_10_live_verification_checks.analytics_trend_intelligence: PASSED - Tab shows competitor shorts and trending keywords sections
sprint_10_live_verification_checks.overview_1320_subscribers: PASSED - YouTube Stats card shows 1,320 subscribers, 116,803 views, 73 videos
sprint_10_live_verification_checks.roi_ad_revenue: PASSED - Shows $175.20 ad revenue based on 116,803 views × $1.50 CPM
sprint_10_live_verification_checks.blog_5_chanakya_articles: PASSED - Shows 5 articles: Saam Daam Dand Bhed, Panchatantra Principle, Karma Yoga, Mandala Strategy, Arthashastra Economics
